item.title: A good interview with Simon Willison on Around the Prompt
item.description:
Things I like:

  • Simon’s stance that AI is exciting and amazing when it’s a cyborg like enhancement to us. Wehn it makes idnividuals 10 or 20 times as procuctive and creative. .

item.title: Podcast interview with Prof Alan Brown about uses of AI in Government
item.description: I’ve been thinking recently about how to frame the ways that (generative) AI is going to make its way into enterprise and the public sector. A recent podcast interview between Professor Alan Brown and Think Tank touched upon this.
